Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Fullstack Developer
Description: Spearheaded the frontend development efforts for the TankhaPay project using Angular, resulting in user-friendly and responsive interfaces that significantly improved the application's overall user experience.
Integrated frontend components, optimizing performance and maintainability, and directly contributed to the successful securing of $2.7 million in funding from Japanese investors.

Demonstrated expertise in designing, developing, and maintaining robust REST APIs utilizing Node.js and Express, while also contributing to the optimization of PostgreSQL functions to reduce server load, resulting in improved application performance and efficiency.
Implemented various features in the Tankhapay web application including authentication, data binding, and responsive design.

Developed Excel download feature for reports, made multiple salary slips in single PDF download feature, and optimized application performance. This module contributed to securing over 8 clients and generating revenue exceeding 1 crore.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Tankhapay
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: At TankhaPay, I led Angular development, enhancing efficiency by 20% through an intuitive interface. I automated payroll processes, ensuring precise salary calculations. Additionally, I integrated robust RESTful APIs using Node.js, facilitating seamless communication between front end and back end. My focus was on streamlining operations and elevating overall platform performance.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Doodle Keep
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: In the Doodle Keep project, I spearheaded the development of a dynamic note-taking application using Angular, focusing on creating a highly responsive and user-friendly interface. I implemented features like real-time data synchronization and optimized the app’s performance to handle large volumes of user input smoothly. By leveraging Angular’s reactive forms and robust state management, I ensured efficient data handling and seamless user experiences. Additionally, I integrated RESTful APIs to enable secure data storage and retrieval, providing a stable foundation for note management and enhancing overall platform reliability.   Click here to view Doodle Keep live
